## IdentityManager.identityManagerGetOrCreateIdentity() method

Returns an existing identity or creates a new one for a specific alias

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
identityManagerGetOrCreateIdentity({ provider, alias, kms, options }: IIdentityManagerGetOrCreateIdentityArgs, context: IAgentContext<IKeyManager>): Promise<IIdentity>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                         | Type                                                                                                  | Description |
| --------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| { provider, alias, kms, options } | [IIdentityManagerGetOrCreateIdentityArgs](./daf-core.iidentitymanagergetorcreateidentityargs.md)      |             |
| context                           | [IAgentContext](./daf-core.iagentcontext.md) &lt;[IKeyManager](./daf-core.ikeymanager.md)<!-- -->&gt; |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IIdentity](./daf-core.iidentity.md) &gt;
